projectDescription: ElevateEx connects students, instructors, and admins. Students enroll in courses and track progress. Instructors create and submit courses. Admins manage users and content. ElevateEx enhances learning with a user-friendly interface.
features: There are 3 types of user facility. Like, admin, instructor, student or general user. For each type there will be a functional dashboard.
Students will be able to access the courses that are approved by the admin and able to enroll in it.In Student Dashboard, he will have access to his profile and his enrolled courses.

Any general user or instructor will have the opportunity to be an admin on that platform. For that, He will have to apply to be an admin. There will be an available route on the right sidebar which will open when you click over your profile image on the home page.

projectDescription: Trip_Flip is a hotel management web application designed to provide travelers with a seamless experience in exploring and booking hotel services worldwide. Users can sign up, book rooms, manage their bookings, and share their experiences, all through a user-friendly interface.
features: One can create an account with his credentials or using an existing google or github account.
After signing in he will be able to book a room at the hotel of his choice and have the ability to edit the booking info.
After checking Out of the hotel he will be able to review his experience of the service in a post which will show in the home page alongside the rooms page.

projectDescription: Artisan Haven is designed to showcase textile art and craft in an engaging and user-friendly platform. Whether you're an artist wanting to display your work or an enthusiast exploring new crafts, Artisan Haven offers a vibrant community and a seamless experience.
features: This is a Textile art and craft gallery so here people can view various types of arts and crafts.
After registering one will have access to add new crafts to our gallery. And he will be able to edit, update or delete his created crafts from his account on our platform
Another mind blowing feature is category based crafts showing where he will experience with an awesome work.
